buzzr 1.0.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    bin()

    Bin results by time and count detections

    bin_directory()

    Read and bin all buzzdetect results in a directory

    call_detections()

    Call detections using thresholds

    commontime()

    Coerce all dates to the same day, preserving time of day

    file_start_time()

    Extract timestamps from paths

    label_hour()

    A simplified scale_x_datetime label that returns only the hour of the day (for use with commontime)

    list_matching_tag()

    List all files matching a tag (e.g., '_buzzdetect')

    palette

    The buzzdetect color palette

    read_directory()

    Read all buzzdetect results in a directory, recursively

    read_results()

    Read buzzdetect results

    theme_buzzr()

    A ggplot theme for aesthetic plotting of buzzdetect results.

    time_of_day()

    Get the time of day as a 0-1 value (left-inclusive) where 0 represents midnight

    Contents

    Developed by Luke hearon.
